title: Keen 2 secret level?
content: Is there a secret level to Keen 2?  Don't tell me where it is if it exists.  Just whether or not I should look for it.

title: hehe
content:
You should not bother looking for it; it doesn't exist. :-)

--Xky

title: Re: hehe
content:
I've always wondered why Keen 2 and Dreams don't have secret levels. Anyone know why?
Perhaps the shortage of levels:
8 tantalus rays + 2 home + 2 engine + 2 other (forgot) = 16 levels, which is probably thier limit.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: hehe
content: Hmmm, who knows. But can't understand why 16 would be their limit (although it seems to be the limit pretty much in not-patched Keen 2). But yeah, I was trying to search it when I was small. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: hehe
content:
I also miss in the later keens all the fun messages you get in keen 1. Oh well. Thanks for the info, tho. I kinda feared that to be the case as I didn't see any indication of one while playing through the game. Keen 2 is pathetically easy. I remember getting stuck on one level because I didn't know the purpose of the lights. Once you get that, the few challenging parts aren't that challenging.

Xky, I dind't know what the lights were for when I played your keen2 mod, so I never turned them off. I then found some message in the bottom of one of the keen 2 original levels that told me what the lights do.

title: Re: hehe
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]I've always wondered why Keen 2 and Dreams don't have secret levels. Anyone know why?
Perhaps the shortage of levels:
8 tantalus rays + 2 home + 2 engine + 2 other (forgot) = 16 levels, which is probably thier limit.[hr][/quote]

16 levels is not the limit, 32 levels is close. It would be easy to allow 64 levels, and adding a 17th 'extra' level is a piece of cake, even without patching [it uses an unused little bit of code] Apparently Keen 2 being all mapped out 'n' such just did have the right 'feel' for a secret level.

As for KeenDreams, I was walking on the map one day when I entered a piece of grass by Castle Tuberia. I emerged in a very small, point filled level that I have never been able to get to again. I have the saved game in its own little directory.A proud member of the signature stealing society


[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/antiror.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here.
" -Level Lord

title: Re: hehe
content: You can get to that small level by entering any one of about half a dozen values into the level warp cheat. Seems like it was just pasted over all of the empty level slots, for some reason.

title: Re: hehe
content:
But the extra levels don't work sometimes and sometimes do etc..
And IIRC adurdin said something clever about this matter. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] (Won't even try to dig it from K: M..)You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
